channel.title: Space Policy on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Space Policy on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Trump orders cull of regulations governing commercial rocket launches
item.description: The head of the FAA’s commercial spaceflight division will become a political appointee.

item.title: What exactly is Golden Dome? This Space Force general owes Trump an answer.
item.description: “Basically, I’ve been given 60 days to come up with the objective architecture.”

item.title: Nearly 3,000 people are leaving NASA, and this director is one of them
item.description: Makenzie Lystrup’s departure from Goddard comes soon after the resignation of the director of JPL.

item.title: Congress moves to reject bulk of White House’s proposed NASA cuts
item.description: We’re still months away from these budget bills having a chance to become law.

item.title: Nearly everyone opposes Trump’s plan to kill space traffic control program
item.description: Space Force officials and more than 450 aerospace companies are against the White House’s proposal.
